VARIANT [LARGE SCALE ANALYSIS] VAL-682 (ISOFORM 3)

comment.text: Serine/threonine kinase that may play a role in the response to environmental stress and cytokines such as TNF-alpha. Appears to act upstream of the JUN N-terminal pathway. Phosphorylates SMAD1 on Thr-322.
ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein.

Interacts with the SH3 domain of the adapter proteins Nck (By similarity). Interacts (via its CNH regulatory domain) with ATL1 (via the N-terminal region). Interacts with RAP2A (GTP-bound form preferentially).

isoform.text: Gene prediction based on EST data.

comment.text: Widely expressed. Isoform 5 is abundant in the brain. Isoform 4 is predominant in the liver, skeletal muscle and placenta.
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. STE Ser/Thr protein kinase family. STE20 subfamily.

property.value: F:signal transducer, downstream of receptor, with serine/threonine kinase activity

feature.description: Mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase kinase kinase 4
In isoform 2, isoform 4, isoform 5 and isoform 6.
In isoform 2, isoform 3, isoform 4 and isoform 5.
